thread.title: Professional Mom in the USA
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by Professional Mom in the USA

author: Professional Mom in the USA
title: Professional Mom in the USA
text: Tonight, I did my first reservation for a multiple-leg trip to Europe with ASAP. The price was significantly less than via other agents or website. In fact, we saved over 30% on the purchase. The agent was very helpful and worked with me every step of the way accommodating my schedule. I hope that the actual travel experience will mirror the booking process. So far, I highly recommend ASAP Tickets and Bronson, the agent.
